resources.string: If you\'re enjoying Blacksmith Slots, would you mind leaving a rating? It helps more people discover the game, and encourages future development!\n\nThanks <3
Handed in %1$s to complete task at \"%2$s\"!
This task can\'t be completed yet!
Reached level %1$d, you can now prestige in the settings! %2$s
Purchased a Blacksmith Pass, and received a free upgrade to VIP level 1!
%1$.2f% of the way to level %2$d (%3$d / %4$d xp)!
To unlock map \"%1$s\" slot \"%2$s\" must be completed!
Successfully loaded and imported local game save!
Successfully exported game save to %s on external storage!
Cloud save conflict! Attempting to resolve, this may take a few seconds.
An error occurred, please contact blacksmithslots@jakelee.co.uk if this happens repeatedly!
An error occurred! Please check your storage is correctly connected, and permissions have been given. Error: %s.
Your bonus is ready to claim!

No advert could be loaded! 

This can be caused by poor internet, recently enabling adverts, or no advertisers currently advertising in your area. 

If you wait until the countdown at the top reaches 0 and turns green, closing this window will provide the advert reward. 

Whilst you're waiting, you could leave the game a rating. It's the best way to help the game grow! 

Or even check out the original game, Pixel Blacksmith. I think it's rather fun!
Whilst your Blacksmith Pass is valid, you will receive free items every day!\n\nCheck back anytime between 00:00 and 23:59 to claim!
Purchasing a Blacksmith Pass entitles you to %1$d days of free daily goodies!\n\nYour first purchase will also upgrade you to VIP 1! Higher VIP levels earn more from a BS pass!
You\'ve made it to the maximum VIP level!\n\nThere\'s no more VIP levels, but there\'s always item bundles and the Blacksmith Pass if you just can\'t get enough!
Failed to find a Pixel Blacksmith save! Make sure you\'ve given permission to access external storage, and try exporting the save again.
Failed to find a Blacksmith Slots save! Make sure you\'ve given permission to access external storage, and that the save is in /BlacksmithSlots/. Error: %s
Can\'t claim Blacksmith Pass rewards without having a Blacksmith Pass!
Enables and disables the in-game background music.
Enables and disables the in-game sound effects.
When enabled, this will only show rewards from the current slot in the inventory tab whilst in a slot.
This allows the in-game language to be configured.
Enables and disables sounds from notifications.
When enabled, a notification will be sent when the free bonus items has recharged.
Importing a Pixel Blacksmith save provides some immediate resources, and may help you towards the end of the game.
When enabled, the inventory panel in slots will only show items that you have more than zero of.
When enabled, the inventory panel in slots will show items ordered by tier, not quantity.
When enabled, the inventory panel in slots will show items in a reversed order.
When enabled, a notification will be sent when the daily Blacksmith Pass reward is ready.
Enables auto-saving, which can be managed via the Google Play settings on the map screen.
Configures the game to either lock to portrait or landscape, or match the device\'s current orientation.

At level 25+ and VIP level 1+, you can prestige. This will reset your game progress, but keep your current statistics (except XP) and trophy progress. You will receive +1 wildcard per slot, but -20% XP.
I\'ve been trapped by the disaster, please help me out!
Phew, thank you for rescuing me. Once you\'ve exchanged your lucky coins for some resources, go to the nearby village and find out what caused that!
Please pass me the hatchet so I can get out!
I\'m currently closed, my ore has disappeared!
If you\'ve got the ore, I\'ve got the fire!
Do you have some bronze ore to help me get started? I\'ll let you use my furnace in return.
My little store is staying shut for now, the Purple is out there!
First, I\'ll need some bars to mould into shapes.
All I need now is some bronze secondary to finish the items up, and the store can open back up.
That Purple has ruined my day, I\'m not opening.
My feet are really cold. No, really. Got some shoes?
Okay, now my hands are freezing. My fingers are basically falling off!
This is all very important. I now have a cold.. uh.. head?
Fine, I\'ll open up. Just convince me a tiny bit more.
Not just anyone can get access to weapons!
Come on in, get your weapons!
I\'m going fishing this weekend with some friends, can you help me out?
You\'ve played before, right? I don\'t recognize you, can you prove you know what you doing?
Alright, give me a minute to get the shop ready. Come back later.
I love collecting items, gotta get them all!
You know how to collect bonuses too, don\'t you?
Alright, that was easy. Full helmets?
Okay you have accessories, fine. What about pickaxes?
How do you have so many items? Daggers!
Okay, fine, I give up. Any chance you don\'t have bows?
The Purple made all my food disappear!
That darn Purple cracked my shell! Help me rebuild it and you can have some fruit.
I\'m feeling weak, got something green and round?
Yum! What about something even greener?
Too green! Counteract it with something orange please!
I\'m a trader, this darn Purple stole most of my stock.
You gotta risk it to win it!
Okay, first of all I need some apples to get started.
Next, I need some tasty peaches.
Finally, steak. Hey, I need dinner too...
Well, unless you\'ve got a little bribe for me?
Only experienced traders are welcome here!
See the purple area South? Don\'t touch it!!
Remember to stay away from the purple!
The Purple definitely stole my apples. Definitely mine. Definitely stolen.
And limes. All of them. Crazy, right?
Orange too. The Purple hates other colours... promise!
Ignore the Purple, just ignore the Purple.
Well, okay, good luck near the Purple! I\'ll look away!
If you want to get thise close to pure Purple, you\'re gonna need to be tough!
You can\'t come in here! With the Purple loose, it\'s too dangerous. Although it is lunchtime...
Quick, before my lunch break ends!
First, I need some meat. I\'ll cook it myself, don\'t worry.
I need some potatoes with it too, apple of the earth don\'tcha know.
There\'s a tiny bit of room in my tummy left... got some eggs?
This entrance is much more scenic, it\'s still closed though. Sorry.
I have a secret. I adore fruit, and inherited a large amount of iron. Reckon we can work something out?
We\'re running pretty low on equipment since the Purple came.
Please don\'t tell anyone I\'ve let you into the vault, this is meant to be locked up...
First, get us some weapons to use.
Next, some armour to defend us.
Oh, our faces will be exposed though! Can you help with that?
I know you, adventurer. Death and destruction are all you deal in.
You can give me clothes if you want, but don\'t expect anything back...
I am still a worm though, you know.
You should try and find the Library in the castle, over to the East, across the sea.
Trees are great and all, but they\'re much better once they\'re chopped down into books!
Knowledge is power, too. Are you powerful?
How\'d you get in? I don\'t suppose you\'re part of the Purple..?
The Purple came from across the sea to the East.
You know what you\'re doing, right?
There\'s a few gems I\'ve found whilst mining, are you interested?
You know how to mine, right?
Let me get rid of those low quality ores for you, and turn them into something better!
Let\'s just not discuss how much profit I\'m making from the ore exchanges...
You can help me mine first, right?
Oh, and I might need to go fishing later...
There\'s probably underground trees, the Purple has confused everything.
If you\'ve got a lot of bronze items, we can probably come to a deal.
The armoury needs your bronze items, we\'ve got an iron excess in return!
First, we\'re running low on hammers to rebuild some parts of the castle.
Next, we need some swords to defend ourselves
Those swords aren\'t exactly high quality... do you have gloves to protect our hands?
Close up fighting is also a bit risky.. can we shoot from afar?
The walls of my smeltery got blown off by the Purple!
Do you have some iron ore to help me get started? I\'ll let you use my furnace in return.
We felt the Purple effects even here, I heard it came over the water.
Come one, come all, use my anvil!
I\'ll need some bars first, since they all got swept away.
Finally I\'ll need some iron secondary, and then you\'re welcome to use my anvil.
It\'s dangerous down in the mines!
Well, okay, you can come through, but don\'t you dare distract anyone in there, they\'re busy!
Those weak of heart won\'t stand a chance against the Purple.
The mines are far too weak to support new people... can you help strengthen it?
This is a bit embarrassing, but some of the miners are getting scurvy... can you give them some fruit?
Psst! Don\'t tell anyone, but there\'s weapons behind these pillars!
Okay, you can buy some off me.
I\'m not sure if I can trust you... you\'ve traded before, right?
Hmm, okay. Have you figured out how to get free things?
You can\'t come past. You just can\'t.
I\'m taking no responsibility for this.
Why are you here, I\'m not going to let you in.
Nobody can get past here, especially not you!
Past here is a ruined village.
Those in the ruined village are weak, the Purple hit them hard.
Beyond that... even more Purple damage.
I hope one day we can rebuild, but we\'ve lost so, so much...
I\'ve lived in the area my whole life, and the Purple has changed us.
Those that were lost immediately were the lucky ones.
The damage that\'s been done... I don\'t know if it can be restored.
The Purple seeps in everywhere now.
I\'m sure you\'ve seen it, lurking in corners.
Whatever you do, don\'t touch it. It.. does things. It changes people.
When the Purple landed, I was out transporting mined ore.
I didn\'t even see it coming.
When I woke up, I... saw things.
The earth all around was scorched, as if something massive had been there.
I saw... people around me. But they weren\'t people anymore.
The Purple broke something in their minds.
But, anyway, enough about that. What\'s done is done.
How can I help you on your journey...
Animals are okay. Some can talk, but you\'ll get used to that before long.
You\'ll find most people are willing to help you around here.
Some people might try to get a few things from you first, admittedly...
No, I\'m not one of them! I\'m trying to tell you about the world!
Anyway, you need to find the Purple source.
Once it\'s gone, I think some things will be fixed.
Not everything, too much has happened, but... lots.
Welcome to our village! It\'s a little damaged due to the Purple...
Well, go on through, good luck to you!
Look, I don\'t know where you came from, but we can\'t have just anyone roaming around.
Fine, you can go through, but you could at least help us repair?
This used to be a thriving area, but most people left when the Purple came through.
You\'re welcome to trade with me for what little I have left...
I\'ve got plenty of bronze, but everyone here just seems obsessed with iron.
Would you like some of my bronze?
Bronze armour is just great. A majestic brown, such a lovely colour.
Bronze hatchets too! It\'s what I used to cut down wood for my fire. It\'s not the fastest, but it\'s the most satisfying.
Speaking of fire, you know what I like to wear when my fingers are cold?
I was born here, you know.
Okay, I don\'t really have anything to trade... Sorry, I just wanted to chat.
I remember fighting as a boy, iron swords were popular back then.
Oh, and iron shields too! Nothing like the sound of iron on iron.
Do you know what it\'s like to be around for a long time? You look quite young to me.
I was born here, you know.
Okay, I don\'t really have anything to trade... Sorry, I just wanted to chat.
I remember fighting as a boy, iron swords were popular back then.
Oh, and iron shields too! Nothing like the sound of iron on iron.
Do you know what it\'s like to be around for a long time? You look quite young to me.
True, I buy most of my stock off the local traders, but it\'s still good quality!
We need some bows to prepare for the upcoming battle.
Aye-up! We love steel round here!
Yep, steel! Greases the palms, so to speak!
Impressive steel collection you\'ve got, want to improve it?
Once you\'ve visited Mr Left, come use my anvil!
We can\'t have amateur blacksmiths here you understand.
Only those that have proven they can handle steel can use the anvil.
I am so, so sick of fish.
Please, give me something other than fish to eat!
Is that.. is that cooked meat?
The Purple has kind of won the battle here... but we\'re all okay for now!
You know how to make bronze, don\'t you?
And iron, presumably? You came from the west, that\'s all they seem to have over there.
It may not be much, but I\'m the captain of this fine vessel!
I am a little bit hungry though... nothing too much though!
Maybe something a bit easier to eat whilst I walk around this lovely ship?
Typo? No, my name is Amour. Want to have breakfast?
The Purple came from across the great sea to the east.
I don\'t know what\'s over there, but I have full confidence that you can handle it!
I\'m a boatman, I hear you wish to cross the great sea?
I can help you, for a price.
The journey is not for the faint of heart. Can you handle it?
You cannot come in, the Purple has many forms, you could be one of them.
Okay, I believe you\'re not part of the Purple.
You need to be able to defend yourself against the Purple!
Meh, you can keep your fancy iron and steel, bronze has always been enough for me.
The ore is the best bit, such a lovely colour!
Mind you, the secondary is pretty good too... I can\'t decide which I like more!
Since the Purple came through, I haven\'t left my house... I can\'t even fit out the door now.
Thank you for the food, I\'m not too greedy to share!
Potatoes are so starchy, but so good!
I\'m afraid we don\'t take kindly to visitors.
Want to trade with the isolates? You\'ll need sand!
Those other traders might not deal with your currency... I can get you some of their currency if you like?
They can be a bit intimidating... are you ready for them?
Can you guess my favourite colour?
Okay, yep, you got it. Red!
I simply despise things that aren\'t my favourite colour!
Can you guess my favourite colour?
Okay, yep, you got it. Blue!
I simply despise things that aren\'t my favourite colour!
Can you guess my favourite colour?
Okay, yep, you got it. Yellow!
I simply despise things that aren\'t my favourite colour!
Can you guess my favourite colour?
Okay, yep, you got it. Green!
I simply despise things that aren\'t my favourite colour!
Before the Purple, I stole from others. Now, I work with them.
I have nothing now... With some bronze, I could rebuild.
Whilst morality is it\'s own reward, an additional one wouldn\'t hurt...
Before the Purple, I sold fish. I still have my rod, but... that\'s about it. Not even a house!
Eventually I\'ll have a new house, eventually.
Teach a woman to fish, and you feed her for a day. Give a woman a steel fishing rod, and she\'ll eat tons!
Before the Purple, I was a guard. I protected the castle, but now... the Purple has it.
I guess I can still protect the castle, and try and help against the Purple.
I\'m not defined by my clothes, but I\'ll feel a lot safer in stronger armour!
Before the Purple, I mined ore for others. Now, I can\'t safely get across to the Mines!
Eventually the boats will be running again, and I can mine.
If I could pick a pick I\'d pick a steel pick.
Before the Purple, I was a bodyguard. I protected important businessmen, but now.. nobody wants to hurt each other.
Well, I can still protect the others here.
Well, when we\'ve all rebuilt enough to start throwing rocks around, these helmets would help!
If you\'re a local, we\'re sharing food!
Well, you have to give food before you can get it.
Attack all! Everyone! Gotta get rich!
Gotta defend! Gotta gotta defend defend!!!
My feet hurt from my journey... it never ends...
I\'ve seen things whilst transporting... things you wouldn\'t believe...
Who needs food? I have silver!
I left the port, I couldn\'t resist the call of the gold!
Will you.. help me get more gold?
Ignore the overflow, I can fit more gold in!
Food? Who needs food? I\'m rich!
I can share my food... in exchange for MORE wealth.
It\'s hot in here, can you handle the heat?
Well, don\'t tell anyone I went easy on you.
Wanna know why they call me Two Spins? It\'s because I love to spin.
I guess you can look inside though.
It\'s all mine! I don\'t have much, but it\'s miiiine!
Hey! Only the boss can come through here.
Oh you need to talk to him? Okay.
I don\'t like being this close to the library, I can\'t wait until we leave here.
Hey kid, you can\'t come through.
The library has.. weird things in. Don\'t go through there.
Really... don\'t! Some of my guys have gone through there and not come back.
The books of Strength and War are not given to just anyone!
Well, you\'re welcome to them. I hope they don\'t corrupt you, as they have others.
The books of Agility and Life are not given to just anyone!
Alright, now we can both have the books! Awesome!
Hello friend! Do you have some yellow gems around?
Gosh, I just love a nice healthy banana or 50!
The books of Nature and Earth are not given to just anyone!
Enjoy the books! Appreciate the world around you.
To receive from the world, first you must give to it! Got green gems?
Mmmm, I love limes. Nature\'s bitter little gift.
The books of Water and Peace are not given to just anyone!
The books are all yours! Share them with others, spread the joy!
Wouldn\'t you like to swim with the fishes? Not like.. that, as in looking at gems!
Grapes are just the best. So sweet, so tasty.
There is a kingdom, near here! I wish to be the ruler of it!
Oh thank you so much! I\'m sure you can be a jester or something in my kingdom.
Next, give me the ability to wage war.
Now, I want the agility to move freely.
Next, I need the ability to make life.
Next, control over water, and liquids in general.
Finally, peace. To rule with a peaceful hand.
Go on then, just this once.
You do have some ore, right mate?
I wish I could wear human clothes!
Maybe you can wear them instead...
I could make the bars into lovely armour!
And then I could finish it, and wear it with pride!
First, my feet need covering up.
Then, my hands... well, finger bones need covering up.
These weapons are dangerous! Sure you can handle it?
Look, just because they\'re made by a ghost doesn\'t make them any less deadly!
I\'m sure if I could find a pond, and hold the fishing rod, I could do something with the fish.
Only the experienced can handle weapons y\'know!
I have it all! For now.
Bonuses are just the best, aren\'t they?
I guess you might have to mine occasionally too.
I\'m not sure what you\'d use a hammer for really. Making more armour?
Let\'s not discuss what daggers are for...
A bow is for shooting targets. JUST targets!
I like it here among the zombies. They\'re not so bad once you get used to the groaning.
The zombies are really quite friendly.
Before I can begin making rings, I need some gold bars!
Luckily, yellow gems can\'t hurt us, they\'re just pretty.
I\'m not sure you can see the gem very well in a golden ring...
Silly Yellow, he doesn\'t understand that you need contrast to make a good ring!
Yellow is good at his craft though, I\'ll give him that.
Gotta have bars to make rings!
The green gems are so pretty!
The green matches the gold so perfectly.
Pretty gold for the pretty yellow!
The best jewellery has red in it! The colour of love!
You\'ve visited my yellow crafting friend, haven\'t you?
Okay, but what about the.. eccentric Blue?
Nobody can do it, just turn back!
Not even you can do it!
Nobody has red sand, so you can\'t get by!
Fine, green! We\'re the only people with some, it\'s from far away!
I used to be an adventurer like you.
I still am an adventurer, I just used to be too.
Many have tried to get past, but most can\'t even get through all the doors.
I hope one day someone will come by who can do more than just feed the Purple.
My hope is fading though. Time is short, we can do better than Purple.
Any chance you can defeat it?
I want to help defeat the Purple.
Thanks for helping me ready up!
I grew up North of here.
I did alright at school, didn\'t have many friends though.
Eventually I finished school, and my father wanted me to go into carpentry with him.
I did for a while, until I met a girl.
She was.. beautiful. Out of this world. Absolutely perfect.
One night, we ran away together, over near the frozen lands.
It was.. cold, unsurprisingly. We built an igloo.
We lived out there a few weeks, fishing together.
Most of the wildlife was scared of us, so it wasn\'t too dangerous.
One day, we saw smoke on the horizon.
The next, we saw a small camp of bandits nearby.
We hid, hoping they\'d pass us by unhindered.
They didn\'t. She died, I came home.
I.. got in touch with myself. I enjoyed the woodwork.
My father supported me throughout, and I wouldn\'t be here today without him.
When the Purple hit, it corrupted most of his wood, and his forest withered.
We struggled by for a bit, but we soon realised the Purple was getting worse, not better.
The final straw was when more bandits came, and stole what we had left to use for weapons.
After that, I decided to come do my best to fight. I haven\'t been able to get any closer yet.
Glory is not all it\'s cracked up to me.
I used to be in the city guard.
When bandits came, we\'d make sure they didn\'t take anything, or get inside.
It was hard work, but good work.
The morality of life and death.. slips away when you see the hordes that descend upon us.
I worked my way up, and became a captain.
This meant less time on the front, more time planning defences.
I preferred it, honestly. I\'m no coward, but what man wouldn\'t want to stay alive a day longer?
As guards joined and left, I found it hard to care for them as much.
Day in, day out, I\'d see new injuries, new losses.
Eventually, they became numbers to me. Figures on my chart.
One day, I snapped out of it, and realised what I was becoming.
I was no better than the Purple. Seeing people as one mass, not as individuals.
Everyone is unique, that\'s why we\'re so strong as a species.
The Purple doesn\'t understand that, so can\'t even truly defeat us.
Even if it spread over the world, there would be pockets of resistance, forever.
I don\'t want to wait until then though.
I want to take the fight to it, before it has a chance to get a foothold.
It\'s done too much damage to my countrymen already, and I haven\'t forgotten my training.
You know what else is blue? The cloudless sky!
I guess Earth itself is blue too, overall.
Speaking of planets, Neptune is too.
If you look in a mirror? There\'s a chance your eyes will be blue.
And I guess technically your hair, but.. unlikely.
Peacock feathers are blue, and rather striking.
The ocean is too, although I may have already mentioned that with Earth.
Lapis lazuli is blue, and can even be different lightnesses of blue.
Kingfishers have a lovely blue back too.
... anyway, my point is, I know how blue works, and how much better than Purple it is!
Do you know what you\'re in for?
I don\'t recommend pushing on.. There\'s no more to it.
What\'s the point? The Purple will spread regardless, you\'re wasting your life.
Just stop trying to stand in the way.
I am the first guardian. I control the sensation of touch.
Retrieve the adamant gloves, it is your destiny.
First, we reach out without feeling, without seeing.
Then, we begin to understand the world around us using our hands.
Eventually, we learn to use our hands to control the world around us.
Ultimately, our hands become the greatest record of our lives.
I am the second guardian. I control the travel from one location to another.
Retrieve the adamant boots, it is your destiny.
When we are born, we cannot walk, and rely entirely on others.
Eventually, we can move by ourselves, much to the delight of those around us.
Then we learn that we can use our feet to get what we want.
Ultimately, we crush others with our feet, bringing the whole race down.
I am the third guardian. I control the flow of food in the body.
Retrieve the forbidden food, it is your destiny.
When born, we rely on others to feed us, and make sure we get enough nutrients.
As we age, we fend for ourselves, with varying degrees of success.
The constant choice between a moment on the lips or a lifetime on the hips engulfs our lives.
Until one day, we no longer have a choice. We must eat what we are fed, for we have no strength less.
I am the fourth guardian. I control defence against enemies.
Retrieve the adamant shield, it is your destiny.
Newborn, we are defenceless. We rely on family for protection.
Eventually we lose this barrier, and must defend ourselves.
Many fail. Many fall apart, and fall by the wayside. A few survive.
Those that can defend against the world will achieve great things, for they cannot be intimidated.
I am the fifth guardian. I control being close to others, and dealing damage.
Retrieve the adamant sword, it is your destiny.
When young, all are welcome to come close. All are trusted, all are welcome.
A few abuse this trust, and before long the defences come up. Few are allowed through.
These few go deeper than the many ever could, burrowing deep into our hearts and consciousness.
Until one day, they go. They tear apart. Strike first, before the damage can be dealt.
I am the sixth guardian. I control dealing damage from afar.
Retrieve the adamant bow, it is your destiny.
When young, we only know what is immediately around us. We concern ourselves with nothing else.
Eventually we discover the world exists outside our own door, that great evil and great good exists in all worlds.
Helping and supporting those that will never be met is hard, but if there is an afterlife, this is redemption.
The real question is, will they return the favour when you need it?
I am the seventh guardian. I control protection against any incoming assaults.
Retrieve the adamant armour, it is your destiny.
We must let others in. They must become trusted.
They may watch us whilst we sleep, rely upon us for anything and everything, and all will be returned.
No matter how it feels, never forget that it can end in a moment. You may not see it coming at all.
But it is better to have loved and lost than to have never loved.
I am the eighth and final guardian. I control all, never forget the power contained within rings.
Retrieve the almighty ring, it is your destiny.
At first, we have no control. Not over our bowels, not over our voice, nothing.
As we age, control is gained piece by piece. Urges are repressed, desires are squashed, interests are ignored.
Is this okay? Should we be fighting ourselves, and our base instinct?
Well, what happens when we lose? What happens when we give in to our monkey brain?
I am the Purple, and the Purple is I.
Material possessions are nothing, you may have whatever you want.
You cannot truly live without others touching your life. No matter your trade, cooperation is required.
Wherever you travel, there will be those that help you, and those that wish to hurt you. Differentiating is the greatest challenge, and even seasoned veterans fail.
The key to achieving is never ending effort. Striving for what you want and need, never settling for second best, and never resting.
But is success enough? What is glory, with nobody to share it with? Someone must be trusted, even at the risk of heartbreak and torture.
I came here because of what I saw. I saw betrayal, hurt, and suffering. What race wants to exist where unhappiness is expected, and usual?
Apparently you do. As I watched from my cave, the world did not descend into war and famine as expected, instead you banded together. You helped each other, and united against my forces.
Your defences were too great. I could not defeat them, as much as I wanted to. Your final blow down in this dirty cave were inevitable, I could not stop them. You win. It is over.
But ask yourself, was I wrong? What I did brought you together, it made those that survived stronger. Do I not deserve to share in this glory too, for it is as much mine as yours?
That purple stuff? Yeah, I noticed that.
I was trying to make a new enchant, having a bit of trouble getting it working.
Monsters? Aliens? Demons? That doesn\'t sound right...
Mind you, I have seen some pretty weird customers recently. Talking animals etc.
Hey, are you interested in buying some items? What\'re you after?
Hello! You have been inside my shop, right?
Oh, you have! Come on in!
Are you sure you want to leave the minigame with no reward?
Oh no, you\'re out of items! Would you like to lower your bet, go to another slot, or buy more from the shop?
Pick a chest, you only get one chance!
Roll 3 dice, you win your stake multiplied by the total shown on the dice!
Gone up to VIP level %1$d and gained %2$s!
IAP failed, this can be caused by poor internet or third party software interfering with the process.
Something went wrong, and the ad view couldn\'t be verified. Sorry!
Successfully logged out of Google Play Games!

Are you sure you want to load this cloud save?

Local: Lev %1$d (%2$d XP), %3$d Unique Items
Cloud: Lev %4$d (%5$d XP), %6$d Unique Items

Are you sure you want to load this save?

Current: Lev %1$d (%2$d XP), %3$d Unique Items
Save file: Lev %4$d (%5$d XP), %6$d Unique Items

If no email client appeared, email blacksmithslots@jakelee.co.uk!
Support code already used! Don\'t be cheeky!
Error whilst applying code. Please contact support!
A log of spins, and your current VIP / XP level progress are shown at the top of the screen.
The resources required to spin and your current inventory are displayed on the left.
The quantity gambled per row & number of active rows can be changed before each spin.
Additionally, up to 65 autospins can be enabled, alongside a normal spin.
Get spinning, and get some resources to take into town (the next map)!
This is the world. Pretty nice right?
Well, it was.. Until the Purple appeared one day...
It spread quickly, causing chaos and destruction everywhere it touched.
Can you help us stop it? Talk to people, help them out, and find the Purple\'s source.

AESCrypt (https://goo.gl/Ewk2tq) - Support code encryption. 
Android-Gif-Drawable (https://goo.gl/b8OewX) - Animated GIF support. 
Android-Rate (https://goo.gl/qmJ4j6) - Rating / review prompt. 
AppLovin (https://goo.gl/SwXLVy) - Advertising. 
BaseGameUtils (https://goo.gl/Xwt8AM) - Google Play integration. 
Butterknife (https://goo.gl/Z2CU2Y) - Field / method binding. 
Crouton (https://goo.gl/x3Flgw) - Pop-up alerts. 
GSON (https://goo.gl/A8t4cc) - Cloud save storage. 
IAB Helper (https://goo.gl/rHczTu) - In-app purchases. 
Kankan's Wheel (https://goo.gl/IoROPJ) - Slot machine. 
Picasso (https://goo.gl/KxYjyO) - Image loading. 
Sugar ORM (https://goo.gl/4FJROS) - Database management. 
TourGuide (https://goo.gl/awlGa1) - Tutorial.

Wow, very nice! You\'ve earned yourself %1$s!
How many %1$s would you like to hand in?\n\nHanding in %2$d will unlock the trophy!
You can\'t hand in items you don\'t own!
Higher VIP levels receive more benefits, swipe right on the table below to see more! Your current level is highlighted in green.\nTap a benefit name to view more information about it.
Chest Restock is the time between the free items chest being available.
Chest Boost is the amount of bonus items included in the free items chest.
Advert Restock is the minimum time between advert watches.
BS Pass Bonus is the amount of bonus items included in daily Blacksmith Pass rewards.
Max Auto Spins is the maximum number of autospins that can be performed at once.
Extra Wildcards is the number of extra wildcards added to each slot, increasing the chances of a match. The effect of these can be viewed on the Slot Chances screen.
Each VIP level receives exclusive flair on the /r/BlacksmithSlots subreddit, after messaging /u/JakeSteam with your order number!

Welcome to Blacksmith Slots!

Explore the area, talk to people, and try to save the world from the Purple!

Tap the logo to begin.
Oh no, Mom is trapped! Slots like this have a white outline on the map.
She needs a hatchet to cut herself out, luckily you\'ve got one! Hand in the quest.
Awesome, she\'s free! Let\'s go play the slot!
If a slot is all wildcards, you\'ll win 10x the basic bet instead!
You can swipe left and right as well as tap the arrows to change map!
Curious what to do with an item? Discover the uses of it in the Inventory screen!
Check out the subreddit at https://reddit.com/r/BlacksmithSlots!
Each map has a different slot background! Unlock all the areas to check them all out.
Want to help out? Leave a review / rating (via the settings)!
By the way, this was all made by one person, me! Hello!
Got feedback, bugs to report, or suggestions? Email blacksmithslots@jakelee.co.uk!
Did you know Blacksmith Slots is based on my previous game, Pixel Blacksmith? Try it out!
Turn on Cloud Saves in the settings if you want to change devices, you\'ll lose no progress!
The game can be locked to landscape or portrait in the settings!
Revisit past slots to gather resources!
The language can be changed in the settings if you\'d rather another language!
Higher VIP levels get more bonuses!
Make sure to regularly claim your free bonus items!
You can optionally watch adverts for extra bonus items.
Sick of waiting too long between bonuses? Upgrade your VIP level!
Want more bonus items? Check out the Blacksmith Pass for 30 days of bonus items!
Once a slot is unlocked, the Dialog Log shows a history of all messages with the slot owner.
Additionally, the Reward Chances of all rewards can be seen for unlocked slots.
Trophies can be earned for almost all items in the game, and will provide extra bonus XP for each trophy gained.
Looked away? A log of recent spins can be viewed from inside the slot.
Tapping the VIP or level number areas on the slot screen will provide more information.
Curious what was used to make the game? Check out the Credits!
Will the next card be higher or lower? If you\'re unsure, stick!
To prestige (+1 wildcard, -20% XP) you need VIP 1 and Level 25!

Are you sure you want to prestige?

Your progress will be reset, but you will keep all of your trophies and statistics (except XP). You will gain 1 extra wildcard per prestige, at the cost of -20% XP.

This can't be undone!
At level 25, VIP levels 1 and above can prestige, receiving 1 extra wildcard per slot, but 15% less XP.
Customise your game experience! Tap a setting title to view more information.
To find out where to get an item, click Sources. To find out where to use it, click Uses.
Only the last 100 messages are kept.
Every possible reward is listed. The higher the chance, the more likely the item is to be won!
